chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 Pro is having the following problem:
Marked as delivered on the site but I haven't received anything
Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the package being handed to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 business days. 

Please note: any other POD will not be considered relevant (ie: unsigned document or unclear photo).

If a POD is provided, a police report will be required from the customer to process the claim. 

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Alice, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner for the POD. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
CH

Good morning,

Latest news: the customer received the package.

Yours truly,
Alice from BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare, 

Looks like the issue has been resolved. Kindly close the case if no further assistance is required. 

Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello!

I hope you’re all right. 

The customer received a phone with a poorly placed protective screen, he tried to remove this protective glass and then there are stains on the phone screen.

Why did you send a phone with a misplaced protective screen?

Thanks for your help,
Alice, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

Could the customer please send us some photos of the screen so we can better assess the situation?

Regards,
RK

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We are truly sorry that we are unable to provide you with a satisfactory outcome. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 40 euros commercial gesture instead to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate a return of a device without hardware issues?

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Please disregard the previous message.

Regards,
JY

You will find the photos in the "details" section of this service.

The protective glass has already been removed.

Thanks for your help,
Alice, BackMarket Customer Service

Hello Anais, You will find your prepaid return label attached. Chronopost will take care of your return. Choose the location that suits you best to send back your package. You'll find a list of drop-off locations here: https://www.pickup.fr/trouver-un-point/. Return preparation: 1. See instructions for returning an item here 2. Add all accessories provided with your item 3. Remove any protection, case, and screen protector 4. Package your item and its accessories according to the instructions below. Packaging: • The box must be sturdy and rigid. Place your item so it's stable and won't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box. You can also place an additional label inside in case the outer label gets damaged. • Take photos of the interior and exterior of the package before sending it. This will protect you in case of a problem during transportation. Your return is ready to be sent! We'll let you know when it arrives. We're at your service, Back Market Customer Service, Back Market Customer Service

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer:

We would like to extend our sincere apologies for this inconvenience due to the poorly placed protective screen. However, since there are no other issues with the device, rather than sending a return, would you consider a 30 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead. The screen can be easily cleaned using an alcohol wipe to remove any residue from the protective screen. 

Thank you.

Regards, 
RK

Good morning,

I am contacting you, because according to the follow-up we have, you received the return of the article today.

The customer wants a refund.

In case of refund, you have 48 working hours to proceed with the refund of the order. 

By thanking you in advance. 

Sincerely,
Alice, BackMarket Customer Service

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Alice Back Market customer Care
